name: Maoi Arroyo
text:
I've
 met people who were born in the Philippines and have 2 Filipino parents
 - and they hate the country with a passion. On the other hand I have 
friends who are neither Filipino by blood or by place of birth and they 
work harder than I do to make the country better.  To me, being 
Filipino means caring deeply enough about the country and it's people to
 work towards its betterment no matter where you are.
